flawed_nl_solution:
Andy weighed 156 + 36 = <<156+36=192>>192 pounds after growing taller.
An eighth of his weight is 1/8 x 192 = <<1/8*192=1536>>1536 pounds.
Over the next 3 months, Andy lost 1536 x 3 = <<1536*3=4608>>4608 pounds.
He now weighs 192 - 4608 = <<192-4608=-4416>>-4416 pounds.
Andy weighs 156 - -4416 = <<156--4416=4572>>4572 pounds less than at the beginning of the year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 1536. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
